meanings.definition: Smooth or elegant in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: He was the suavest gentleman at the party, always polite and well-dressed.
meanings.sent2: The suavest dancer glided across the floor with grace and ease.
meanings.sent3: The suavest cat in the neighborhood always walked with a confident swagger.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the suavest silk, soothing and enchanting all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The suavest sunset painted the sky in a palette of warm colors, mesmerizing all who beheld it.

meanings.definition: Showing a high degree of sophistication or charm.
meanings.sent1: The suavest spy effortlessly charmed his way into gaining valuable information.
meanings.sent2: She had the suavest smile, captivating everyone she met.
meanings.sent3: The suavest magician wowed the audience with his tricks and charisma.
meanings.sent4: His words were the suavest weapons, persuading even the most skeptical minds.
meanings.sent5: The suavest melody filled the room, enchanting all who listened with its beauty.
